Package com.github.kaktushose.jda.commands.annotations.interactions

Annotations needed for interactions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SlashCommand.CommandScope
    Enum describing the two possible scopes a command can be registered for.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Button
    Methods annotated with Button will be registered as a button at startup.
    Choices
    Annotation used to add choices to parameters.
    Cooldown
    Commands annotated with Cooldown will have a per-user cooldown.
    Interaction
    Classes annotated with Interaction will be scanned at startup and are eligible for defining interactions such as slash commands, buttons, modals or context menus.
    Optional
    Parameters annotated with Optional are as the name says optional.
    Param
    Annotation used to add a name and description to parameters.
    Permissions
    Interaction classes or SlashCommand methods annotated with Permission will require the user to have the given permissions in order to execute the command.
    SlashCommand
    Methods annotated with SlashCommand will be registered as a command at startup.
